GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns a type of the ApiDrawing class.

SetSize.name: SetSize
SetSize.description: Sets a size of the object (image, shape, chart) bounding box.

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The object width measured in English measure units.

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The object height measured in English measure units.

SetPosition.name: SetPosition
SetPosition.description: Changes the position for the drawing object. Please note that the horizontal and vertical offsets are calculated within the limits of the specified column and row cells only. If this value exceeds the cell width or height, another vertical/horizontal position will be set.

params.name: nFromCol
params.description: The number of the column where the beginning of the drawing object will be placed.

params.name: nColOffset
params.description: The offset from the nFromCol column to the left part of the drawing object measured in English measure units.

params.name: nFromRow
params.description: The number of the row where the beginning of the drawing object will be placed.

params.name: nRowOffset
params.description: The offset from the nFromRow row to the upper part of the drawing object measured in English measure units.

GetWidth.name: GetWidth
GetWidth.description: Returns the width of the current drawing.

GetHeight.name: GetHeight
GetHeight.description: Returns the height of the current drawing.

GetLockValue.name: GetLockValue
GetLockValue.description: Returns the lock value for the specified lock type of the current drawing.

SetLockValue.name: SetLockValue
SetLockValue.description: Sets the lock value to the specified lock type of the current drawing.

params.name: bValue
params.description: Specifies if the specified lock is applied to the current drawing.
